title: Gittip: Inspiring Generosity
summary:
Gittip is a platform for sustainable crowd-funding. The site's primary
funding mechanism is the "gift tip," a small, anonymous, weekly gift to
a worthwhile person or project. These gifts are given with no strings
attached, and represent a new model for funding free and open source
software. Moreover, Gittip itself is funded on Gittip, with potential
implications far beyond software.
